version_description:
Several bug fixes ...

And still in this version :

You can now give feedback on your most recent long-haul flight (on specific flights only).

Boarding pass: The Check-In Deadline has been added to the boarding pass, and it’s now easier to access your ticket number within your reservations.

Archive folder: You can find your previous boarding passes here.

Payment: Wallet is available in all the mobile app languages.

Your profile: Save multiple payment cards and add people traveling with you via your Contacts.

Purchase: You can enter your BlueBiz reference number when you book your flight.

Did your baggage go missing and not make it onto the right plane?
You can track it every step of its journey to your destination! This feature will be available progressively for all countries.

Every new version of our app is designed to make your trip even smoother: before, during and after your flight!
Imagine your upcoming trip with our travel guide “Travel by Air France.” You’ll find tips on the best places to go and practical information to get the most out of your trip.
Can’t connect to Internet whilst you’re away? Download the guide for your destination before you travel, and use it anytime!
What’s more, we’ve added new widgets and 3D Touch shortcuts, and a new tab for “Contracts” in your profile where you can find your loyalty cards and BlueBiz contract.

Every new version of our app is designed to make your trip even smoother: before, during and after your flight!
Imagine your upcoming trip with our travel guide “Travel by Air France.” You’ll find tips on the best places to go and practical information to get the most out of your trip.
Can’t connect to Internet whilst you’re away? Download the guide for your destination before you travel, and use it anytime!
What’s more, we’ve added new widgets and 3D Touch shortcuts, and a new tab for “Contracts” in your profile where you can find your loyalty cards and BlueBiz contract.

Enable GPS on your device for travel time to the airport, directions and trip details… Starting from 5 hours before your flight's departure time, we'll tell you everything you need to know!

On our updated version, when you check your booking details, you'll see new photos that will give you a taste of what to expect on your upcoming trips.

Find great deals in duty-free as well as exclusive special offers in the Partners section!

Share screenshots taken in the app quickly and easily.

Add the Travel by Air France travel guide to your Favorites.

Welcome on board! The app is now available for flights departing from Ivory Coast.

You can also see our new 3D Touch shortcuts.

A new browsing experience is ready for you to try!
We have redesigned the layout and the navigation bar, putting the main functions of the app at your fingertips.
Need "More"? Click on the "More" button to open up your menu.
Not logged in to your Flying Blue account? Or not a member yet? Log in or sign up straight from the homepage!

You're going to love this!  

Personalize your homepage: destination weather, how to get to the airport, travel guides? It's up to you!
How does it work? Watch the How-to video!

Is your child traveling alone? From departure to arrival, track and share his or her journey with your friends and family.

Want to be the envy of your friends? Why not share your journey with them!

New design: tap the 'Buy' tab to book all your tickets!

Enjoy the app's features in Vietnam.

We have given the check-in pages a makeover: Everything is much faster now! You'll also be able to change your flight easily before or after you've checked in.

Going to a lounge? You'll receive an invitation!

Boarding pass: We can now let you know which boarding zone to go to in certain airports.

Other new features: You can book a flight for a child traveling alone and receive tips and advice!

Djibouti, Indonesia, Dominican Republic, Slovakia... Welcome on board!

Are you a Flying Blue member? Do you like numbers?
Number of destinations, combined baggage weight...use your smartphone to explore the fun statistics of your journeys. For sharing!

In hall K of Paris-Charles de Gaulle airport, turn on your GPS and let us guide you. Starting from 5 hours before your flight, find your journey time and the steps to arrive at your boarding gate.

Is your child traveling alone? Watch this video to follow each step of his or her trip in real time!

Want to share an opinion or a suggestion? With this new tool, it's even easier.

Too many cards on your homepage? For your next trip, we offer instead 1 single card.

Looking for a good restaurant? Our partner La Liste reveals its favorite restaurants around the world.

Deleted a notification? Don't panic! Find it again in your inbox, where it'll be saved for 15 days.

Your mobile boarding pass is getting a makeover! However, this new version is currently available only in English... Sorry!
All your information is here! To find it, scroll down to the bottom of your boarding pass or simply click on it.
Are you traveling in a group? Swipe across your screen to see the other boarding passes!
And you can always add your boarding pass to your Apple Wallet: the button is located at the bottom of your boarding pass!

Is your main flight operated by Joon? Head over to the Reservations tab to enjoy exclusive deals from our partners Airbnb, BHV Marais and TravelCar.

When you check in, we'll ask for your date of birth. If you've entered this information into your profile, it'll be prefilled automatically.

There was a display error that occurred with the automatic addition of flights to your Outlook calendar, so we have now deactivated this feature.

You've been waiting for it and we've done it: start booking multi-city trips with your smartphone!

Is your child traveling alone? On connecting flights? Track and share his or her flight with your friends and family, from departure to arrival at the final destination!

Was your flight delayed or canceled? Download the flight delay or cancelation receipt.

Games: starting now, find stats about aircraft types!

Do you have a connection at Paris-Charles de Gaulle*? As soon as you exit the aircraft, use your GPS to get to the boarding gate of your next flight.

* Available for flights from:
T2E Halls K, L and M to T2F;
T2E Hall K to T2G;
T2F to T2E Hall L and T2G;
T2G to T2E Hall K.

Better late than never… the Air France app is finally available for iPhone X. Enjoy!

You can now book multi-city trips on your tablet.

Flight canceled? Book a new flight free of charge. This feature is available starting from 30 hours to 1 hour before your flight, for direct flights operated by Air France, HOP! and KLM, excluding return day trip flights.

Have an ID document saved in your profile? Your information will be pre-filled the next time you need to check in!

Listen up! Air France notifications are now recognizable thanks to our new ringtone!

We have improved the description of the Air France lounges. Just click on the relevant card on the homepage!

We've added to the "Contact us" page. Have a question about your baggage? Our virtual assistant Louis can answer it in real time via Messenger!

We've also updated the look and feel of the navigation bar. Yay for icons!

Have a connection at Paris-Charles de Gaulle? Use our map to see the route to the boarding gate of your next flight. And you can even zoom in!

In the app, we can now guide you every step of the way. If a map is available for your airport, you'll find it on the homepage as soon as check-in opens. Just tap the link and follow the guide! You can also download the map from the menu at any time. The airport list is updated as soon as a new map is available.

In the app, we can now guide you every step of the way. If a map is available for your airport, you'll find it on the homepage as soon as check-in opens. Just tap the link and follow the guide! You can also download the map from the menu at any time. The airport list is updated as soon as a new map is available.

Bug fix, but still in this version:

We've added to the "Contact us" page. Have a question about your baggage? Our virtual assistant Louis can answer it in real time via Messenger!

Traveling alone and checked in a baggage item? Thanks to the app, you will soon be able to track your baggage throughout your journey. This feature will be available for flights between Paris and Bordeaux or Nice.

We've partnered up with Booking.com! Book your perfect accommodation directly in the app.

We have stopped displaying the number of non-read cards on your homepage. You didn't want it, so we removed it!

You can add flights to your calendar again! It was about time...

Your app is getting a makeover to make your journey even smoother... checking in, boarding, and even changing flights is now child's play.

Want to change seats for even more comfort? Need to add more baggage to bring back more memories? And why not choose an "A la Carte" Menu? Personalize your trip in the blink of an eye!

WiFi connectivity, USB ports, seat types... discover everything you'll find on your next flight directly in the app.

Hey Siri, is my flight scheduled on time?
Vocal assistance is now available in your app! Ask Siri to track your flight.

A REDESIGNED AND SIMPLIFIED BOOKING TOOL

New features in your app

You can now pay for your flight tickets with a voucher. If the voucher is linked to COVID-19, it is eligible for a bonus of up to 15%.

In accordance with current regulations, you will be required to fill out a sworn statement certifying that you do not present any symptoms of COVID-19 before checking in. This declaration is available in the app.

New features in your app

You can now pay for your flight tickets with a voucher. If the voucher is linked to COVID-19, it is eligible for a bonus of up to 15%.

In accordance with current regulations, you will be required to fill out a sworn statement certifying that you do not present any symptoms of COVID-19 before checking in. This declaration is available in the app.

What's new in your app

To help you maintain physical distancing whenever possible, the cabin map now displays seats that have been blocked.

The flight search page has been simplified and offers improved booking options by passenger type.

The Flight Updates page has been redesigned to provide flight information in a more uniform format!

Find and book activities at your destination with our new partner Viator!

New in your app

Now you can treat yourself by adding lounge access to your next trip departing from Paris.

Need to rent a car? Your request is now pre-filled with all the details of your trip.

Get a refund more easily in My Bookings.

Do you travel in groups? You can find the list of your travel companions in the app, and easily add those who will be traveling with you. If you add a new passenger during a booking, you can also save their information to your profile.
